left_text: Eyes hairless; preoccipital carina absent laterally, behind eyes
right_text: Eyes with abundant, short hairs; preoccipital carina present laterally, behind eyes (mandible of female fourtoothed)

left_text: Arolia present; mandible of female four-toothed (Namibia)
right_text: Arolia absent; mandible of female usually ﬁveto tentoothed or denticulate (four-toothed only in Pachyanthidium micheneri Pasteels) (Africa)

left_text: T3 to T5 each with slender lateral spine; ocelli small, diameter about equal to width of base of ﬁrst ﬂagellar segment; hind coxa not carinate; arolia present in male, absent in female (Africa, oriental)
right_text: T3 to T5 without lateral spines; ocelli of ordinary size, diameter greater than width of base of ﬁrst ﬂagellar segment; hind coxa carinate; arolia absent (possibly with very minute arolia in both sexes) (Africa, Arabia)
